name: Foundations of Artificial Intelligence
description: An introduction to the fundamental concepts of Artificial Intelligence, including search algorithms, game playing, constraint satisfaction, and machine learning basics.

name: Principles of Database Systems
description: Broad overview of database systems, including relational models, SQL, transaction management, and concurrency control.

name: Deep Learning
description: Advanced topics in deep neural networks, including CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, and their applications in computer vision and NLP.

name: Artificial Intelligence I
description: Study of AI agents, problem solving by searching, logic and inference, planning, and uncertainty.

name: Machine Learning
description: This course covers the principles of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, classification, regression, and clustering.
